text: Elections to High Peak Borough Council in Derbyshire, England were held on 7 May 1979. All of the council was up for election and control of the council changed from Conservative control to no overall control.http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/shared/vote2007/councils/html/17uh.stm Boundary changes since the 1976 local elections reduced the number of seats by 2. After the election, the composition of the council was: *Conservative 22 *Labour 12 *Liberal 2 *Independent 8 ==Election result== ==Ward results== ==References== 1979 High Peak Category:1970s in Derbyshire
title: 1979 High Peak Borough Council election
